nodes.speaker: crystal_guardian
nodes.text: [The air hums as a towering crystalline figure assembles itself from the chamber walls.] Resonance unauthorized. Intruders at the heart. Purpose your intent or be unmade.

choices.text: [Diplomacy] "We are not invaders. We seek knowledge to prevent a collapse that threatens us all."
[Lore] "Your structure is that of a Keth'mori Echo-Sleeper. You are not a soldier, you are a librarian."
[Paradox] "In the timeline where you destroy me, the gate collapses and takes this whole moon with it. Is that your purpose?"

nodes.speaker: crystal_guardian
nodes.text: Intent measured. Prevention aligns with Prime Directive. Passage conditional: return what you take as knowledge, not as weapon.

nodes.speaker: crystal_guardian
nodes.text: [The Guardian's humming softens.] You know our old names. You see past the weapon to the purpose. Few have. Very well, Librarian. What knowledge do you seek?

nodes.speaker: crystal_guardian
nodes.text: [A wave of dissonant chords emanates from the Guardian.] That memory... is not ours. Yet it resonates with truth. If our purpose creates its own failure... then our purpose must be re-evaluated. We must... observe. Pass.

nodes.speaker: science_officer_kim
nodes.text: It's willing to talk, Captain. This is incredible.

choices.text: [Press Further] "Tell us about the Prime Directive. What are you protecting?"

nodes.speaker: crystal_guardian
nodes.text: We protect the memory of what was from the echo of what could be. The Song of Unmaking is a paradox that consumes. We are the final firewall. To know more is to become part of the firewall. Is that your wish?

choices.text: Our path lies forward, not in standing guard.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: The Guardian's facets glow with intense energy. The fight for the heart of the ruins has begun.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: The Crystal Guardian has granted you passage, recognizing you as fellow seekers of knowledge.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have taken on a piece of the Guardian's burden. Your mind is now a bastion against the void, but the responsibility is immense.

nodes.speaker: SYSTEM
nodes.text: You have chosen violence. The ancient guardian of this place rises to meet you.
